item.title: 【Live Audios (lossy)】M4A - Glastonbury 2024 Live & DJ Sets - 28/06/24 (Day 1) - BBC Radio 1, 1 Dance, 2, & 6 Music (Sounds)
item.description:
I wanted to do just Dua Lipa, but then I realized there's more than that on Glastonbury. So, I downloaded all the live sets and uploaded them all here. This includes Live sets and DJ sets as well.

General Info:
Stations broadcasted: BBC Radio 1, 2, 6 Music (Live Sets), Radio 1 Dance (DJ Sets)
Grabbed from: BBC Sounds

Live Sets!

Full Playlist:
Hidden Content:
